title: Capital city
creator_credit: London Transport Executive and Academy Picture Corporation
brief_description: A tour of London by bus, showing a selection of the capital’s historic buildings, places of interest, and the surrounding countryside. Commentary spoken by Norman Hackforth and George Stanford.
